title: Jaimie Alexander shows off her edgy style on set... after recovering from her recent knee surgery
text:
Jaimie Alexander is back on set despite a bit of soreness after her recent knee surgery.

The 35-year-old donned a head-to-toe black look while filming her television show Blindspot on Monday.

She did appear to be in good spirits as she smiled at the cameras while sipping on her coffee as she makes her comeback from her torn ACL and MCL.

Back on set: Jaimie Alexander donned a head-to-toe black look while filming her television show Blindspot on Monday

Coming back: She did appear to be in good spirits as she smiled at the cameras while sipping on her coffee as she makes her comeback from her torn ACL and MCL

For her day on set, she wore a black leather jacket and black t-shirt along with some black skinny jeans.

She also wore a pair of combat boot that went well with the edgy style as she got into her Jane Doe character.

While she never fully revealed what caused the injury but did take to her Twitter to let fans know she had injured herself.

'Hey guys! I tore my ACL and MCL...so if you wanna help me feel better - tune in TONIGHT to an all new #Blindspot,' Alexander said in the tweet.

'This is the last episode for a few weeks and then we will be back on March 8th,' she added.

Jane Doe: For her day on set, she wore a black leather jacket and black t-shirt along with some black skinny jeans

Working through it: While on set, she rubbed her knee

She has been an actress on the Blindspot since the show aired on NBC back in 2015.

Jaimie plays a woman who crawled out of a dufflebag with tattoos covering every inch of her body and whose identity is a mystery as she continues on in the show trying to find out who she really is.

NBC has already ordered a fifth season for the hit show.

Mystery woman: Jaimie plays a woman who crawled out of a dufflebag with tattoos covering every inch of her body and whose identity is a mystery as she continues on in the show trying to find out who she really is

It seems as though she has been having a grand time back on set sharing behind-the-scenes Instagram photos of her and her cast mates.

'He’s right behind me, isn’t he? #Blindspot,' she said in a photo of her and her costar Luke Mitchell last week.

Over the weekend, she shared another photo of her and her 'boss' while on set saying: 'Some of my most favorite days at work are spent with this man, @martingero #Boss #Champ #blindspot.'
